Adventurer Helper:
Just so you don`t forget...
Hunt the Chimera Pieces, Soldier of Ancient Times, Changed Creations, Warrior of Ancient Times, Shaman of Ancien Times, Ancient Creature, Forgotten Ancient People, Forgotten Face, and Giant`s Shadow, all found in the Silent Valley, until you find a 50 Relic Boxes. Then return to Aden and give the boxes to Recipe Merchant Dolphren - he will deem whether or not your task has been carried out to his satisfaction, and pay you if so.
